turns.content: Are there any international festivals or events in Leuven that might reflect the multicultural diversity of the city?

2. Wereldfeest - This multicultural festival celebrates diversity and showcases different cultures through music, dance, and food. It takes place in August.

3. Holi Fusion Festival - This festival celebrates the Indian festival of colors and includes live music, dance, and colorful powders. It takes place in August.

4. Leuven African Festival - This festival celebrates African culture through music, dance, and food. It takes place in September.

5. Leuven Beer Fest - While not directly reflecting the city's multicultural diversity, this festival celebrates the diversity of Belgian beers and attracts beer lovers from all over the world. It takes place in April.

Overall, Leuven has a vibrant cultural scene and offers a range of events and festivals that reflect the city's multicultural diversity.
